00063 void CTreePropSheet::OnBnClickedButtonOk() {
00064         GetActivePage()->UpdateData(true);
00065         AfxGetApp()->m_pMainWnd->GetMenu()->CheckMenuItem(ID_SETTINGS_PARAMETERS, MF_UNCHECKED | MF_BYCOMMAND);
00066         m_wndToolBar.GetToolBarCtrl().CheckButton(ID_SETTINGS_PARAMETERS, false);
00067         ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00068 }
00069 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 void CTreePropSheet::OnBnClickedButtonCancel() {
00071         GetActivePage()->UpdateData(false);
00072         AfxGetApp()->m_pMainWnd->GetMenu()->CheckMenuItem(ID_SETTINGS_PARAMETERS, MF_UNCHECKED | MF_BYCOMMAND);
00073         m_wndToolBar.GetToolBarCtrl().CheckButton(ID_SETTINGS_PARAMETERS, false);
00074         ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00075 }
00076 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------

00078 //      ((Model*)GetActivePage())->doc->SetModifiedFlag();
00079         GetActivePage()->UpdateData(true);
00080 }
00081 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 BOOL CTreePropSheet::PreTranslateMessage(MSG* pMsg) 
00083 {
00084    if (pMsg->message == WM_KEYDOWN && pMsg->message >= WM_KEYFIRST && pMsg->message <= WM_KEYLAST)
00085    {
00086              BOOL handled = TRUE;
00087          switch(toupper(pMsg->wParam))
00088          {
00089          case VK_RETURN:               
00090                          OnBnClickedButtonApply();
00091             //PressButton(PSBTN_APPLYNOW);  
00092                         break;
00093          case VK_F12:                     
00094                         OnBnClickedButtonCancel();
00095             //PressButton(PSBTN_CANCEL);     
00096                         break;
00097          default:
00098             handled = FALSE;
00099          }
00100          if (handled)
00101             return TRUE;
00102 
00103    }
00104    return CPropertySheet::PreTranslateMessage(pMsg);
00105 }

00148 BOOL CTreePropSheet::SetTreeViewMode(BOOL bTreeViewMode /* = TRUE */, BOOL bPageCaption /* = FALSE */, BOOL bTreeImages /* = FALSE */)
00149 {
00150         if (IsWindow(m_hWnd))
00151         {
00152                 // needs to becalled, before the window has been created
00153                 ASSERT(FALSE);
00154                 return FALSE;
00155         }
00156 
00157         m_bTreeViewMode = bTreeViewMode;
00158         if (m_bTreeViewMode)
00159         {
00160                 m_bPageCaption = bPageCaption;
00161                 m_bTreeImages = bTreeImages;
00162         }
00163 
00164         return TRUE;
00165 }

00192 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00193 BOOL CTreePropSheet::SetTreeDefaultImages(CImageList *pImages)
00194 {
00195         if (pImages->GetImageCount() != 2)
00196         {
00197                 ASSERT(FALSE);
00198                 return FALSE;
00199         }
00200 
00201         if (m_DefaultImages.GetSafeHandle())
00202                 m_DefaultImages.DeleteImageList();
00203         m_DefaultImages.Create(pImages);
00204 
00205         // update, if necessary
00206         if (IsWindow(m_hWnd))
00207                 RefillPageTree();
00208         
00209         return TRUE;
00210 }
00211 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
00212 BOOL CTreePropSheet::SetTreeDefaultImages(UINT unBitmapID, int cx, COLORREF crMask)
00213 {
00214         if (m_DefaultImages.GetSafeHandle())
00215                 m_DefaultImages.DeleteImageList();
00216         if (!m_DefaultImages.Create(unBitmapID, cx, 0, crMask))
00217                 return FALSE;
00218 
00219         if (m_DefaultImages.GetImageCount() != 2)
00220         {
00221                 m_DefaultImages.DeleteImageList();
00222                 return FALSE;
00223         }
00224 
00225         return TRUE;
00226 }

00265 
00266 BOOL CTreePropSheet::DestroyPageIcon(CPropertyPage *pPage)
00267 {
00268         if (!pPage || !(pPage->m_psp.dwFlags&PSP_USEHICON) || !pPage->m_psp.hIcon)
00269                 return FALSE;
00270 
00271         DestroyIcon(pPage->m_psp.hIcon);
00272         pPage->m_psp.dwFlags&= ~PSP_USEHICON;
00273         pPage->m_psp.hIcon = NULL;
00274 
00275         return TRUE;
00276 }

00303 // Implementation helpers

00305 void CTreePropSheet::MoveChildWindows(int nDx, int nDy)
00306 {
00307         CWnd    *pWnd = GetWindow(GW_CHILD);
00308         while (pWnd)
00309         {
00310                 CRect   rect;
00311                 pWnd->GetWindowRect(rect);
00312                 rect.OffsetRect(nDx, nDy);
00313                 ScreenToClient(rect);
00314                 pWnd->MoveWindow(rect);
00315 
00316                 pWnd = pWnd->GetNextWindow();
00317         }
00318 }

00320 
00321 void CTreePropSheet::RefillPageTree()
00322 {
00323         if (!IsWindow(m_hWnd))
00324                 return;
00325 
00326         m_pwndPageTree->DeleteAllItems();
00327 
00328         CTabCtrl        *pTabCtrl = GetTabControl();
00329         if (!IsWindow(pTabCtrl->GetSafeHwnd()))
00330         {
00331                 ASSERT(FALSE);
00332                 return;
00333         }
00334 
00335         const int       nPageCount = pTabCtrl->GetItemCount();
00336 
00337         // rebuild image list
00338         if (m_bTreeImages)
00339         {
00340                 for (int i = m_Images.GetImageCount()-1; i >= 0; --i)
00341                         m_Images.Remove(i);
00342 
00343                 // add page images
00344                 CImageList      *pPageImages = pTabCtrl->GetImageList();
00345                 if (pPageImages)
00346                 {
00347                         for (int nImage = 0; nImage < pPageImages->GetImageCount(); ++nImage)
00348                         {
00349                                 HICON   hIcon = pPageImages->ExtractIcon(nImage);
00350                                 m_Images.Add(hIcon);
00351                                 DestroyIcon(hIcon);
00352                         }
00353                 }
00354 
00355                 // add default images
00356                 if (m_DefaultImages.GetSafeHandle())
00357                 {       
00358                         HICON   hIcon;
00359 
00360                         // add default images
00361                         hIcon = m_DefaultImages.ExtractIcon(0);
00362                         if (hIcon)
00363                         {
00364                                 m_Images.Add(hIcon);
00365                                 DestroyIcon(hIcon);
00366                         }
00367                         hIcon = m_DefaultImages.ExtractIcon(1);
00368                         {
00369                                 m_Images.Add(hIcon);
00370                                 DestroyIcon(hIcon);
00371                         }
00372                 }
00373         }
00374 
00375         // insert tree items
00376         for (int nPage = 0; nPage < nPageCount; ++nPage)
00377         {
00378                 // Get title and image of the page
00379                 CString strPagePath;
00380 
00381                 TCITEM  ti;
00382                 ZeroMemory(&ti, sizeof(ti));
00383                 ti.mask = TCIF_TEXT|TCIF_IMAGE;
00384                 ti.cchTextMax = MAX_PATH;
00385                 ti.pszText = strPagePath.GetBuffer(ti.cchTextMax);
00386                 ASSERT(ti.pszText);
00387                 if (!ti.pszText)
00388                         return;
00389 
00390                 pTabCtrl->GetItem(nPage, &ti);
00391                 strPagePath.ReleaseBuffer();
00392 
00393                 // Create an item in the tree for the page
00394                 HTREEITEM       hItem = CreatePageTreeItem(ti.pszText);
00395                 ASSERT(hItem);
00396                 if (hItem)
00397                 {
00398                         m_pwndPageTree->SetItemData(hItem, nPage);
00399 
00400                         // set image
00401                         if (m_bTreeImages)
00402                         {
00403                                 int     nImage = ti.iImage;
00404                                 if (nImage < 0 || nImage >= m_Images.GetImageCount())
00405                                         nImage = m_DefaultImages.GetSafeHandle()? m_Images.GetImageCount()-1 : -1;
00406 
00407                                 m_pwndPageTree->SetItemImage(hItem, nImage, nImage);
00408                         }
00409                 }
00410         }
00411 }
00412 
00413 
00414 HTREEITEM CTreePropSheet::CreatePageTreeItem(LPCTSTR lpszPath, HTREEITEM hParent /* = TVI_ROOT */)
00415 {
00416         CString         strPath(lpszPath);
00417         CString         strTopMostItem(SplitPageTreePath(strPath));
00418         
00419         // Check if an item with the given text does already exist
00420         HTREEITEM       hItem = NULL;
00421         HTREEITEM       hChild = m_pwndPageTree->GetChildItem(hParent);
00422         while (hChild)
00423         {
00424                 if (m_pwndPageTree->GetItemText(hChild) == strTopMostItem)
00425                 {
00426                         hItem = hChild;
00427                         break;
00428                 }
00429                 hChild = m_pwndPageTree->GetNextItem(hChild, TVGN_NEXT);
00430         }
00431 
00432         // If item with that text does not already exist, create a new one
00433         if (!hItem)
00434         {
00435                 hItem = m_pwndPageTree->InsertItem(strTopMostItem, hParent);
00436                 m_pwndPageTree->SetItemData(hItem, -1);
00437                 if (!strPath.IsEmpty() && m_bTreeImages && m_DefaultImages.GetSafeHandle())
00438                         // set folder image
00439                         m_pwndPageTree->SetItemImage(hItem, m_Images.GetImageCount()-2, m_Images.GetImageCount()-2);
00440         }
00441         if (!hItem)
00442         {
00443                 ASSERT(FALSE);
00444                 return NULL;
00445         }
00446 
00447         if (strPath.IsEmpty())
00448                 return hItem;
00449         else
00450                 return CreatePageTreeItem(strPath, hItem);
00451 }
00452 
00453 
00454 CString CTreePropSheet::SplitPageTreePath(CString &strRest)
00455 {
00456         int     nSeperatorPos = 0;
00457         while (TRUE)
00458         {
00459                 nSeperatorPos = strRest.Find(_T("::"), nSeperatorPos);
00460                 if (nSeperatorPos == -1)
00461                 {
00462                         CString strItem(strRest);
00463                         strRest.Empty();
00464                         return strItem;
00465                 }
00466                 else if (nSeperatorPos>0)
00467                 {
00468                         // if there is an odd number of backslashes infront of the
00469                         // seperator, than do not interpret it as separator
00470                         int     nBackslashCount = 0;
00471                         for (int nPos = nSeperatorPos-1; nPos >= 0 && strRest[nPos]==_T('\\'); --nPos, ++nBackslashCount);
00472                         if (nBackslashCount%2 == 0)
00473                                 break;
00474                         else
00475                                 ++nSeperatorPos;
00476                 }
00477         }
00478 
00479         CString strItem(strRest.Left(nSeperatorPos));
00480         strItem.Replace(_T("\\::"), _T("::"));
00481         strItem.Replace(_T("\\\\"), _T("\\"));
00482         strRest = strRest.Mid(nSeperatorPos+2);
00483         return strItem;
00484 }
00485 
00486 
00487 BOOL CTreePropSheet::KillActiveCurrentPage()
00488 {
00489         HWND    hCurrentPage = PropSheet_GetCurrentPageHwnd(m_hWnd);
00490         if (!IsWindow(hCurrentPage))
00491         {
00492                 ASSERT(FALSE);
00493                 return TRUE;
00494         }
00495 
00496         // Check if the current page is really active (if page is invisible
00497         // an virtual empty page is the active one.
00498         if (!::IsWindowVisible(hCurrentPage))
00499                 return TRUE;
00500 
00501         // Try to deactivate current page
00502         PSHNOTIFY       pshn;
00503         pshn.hdr.code = PSN_KILLACTIVE;
00504         pshn.hdr.hwndFrom = m_hWnd;
00505         pshn.hdr.idFrom = GetDlgCtrlID();
00506         pshn.lParam = 0;
00507         if (::SendMessage(hCurrentPage, WM_NOTIFY, pshn.hdr.idFrom, (LPARAM)&pshn))
00508                 // current page does not allow page change
00509                 return FALSE;
00510 
00511         // Hide the page
00512         ::ShowWindow(hCurrentPage, SW_HIDE);
00513 
00514         return TRUE;
00515 }
00516 
00517 
00518 HTREEITEM CTreePropSheet::GetPageTreeItem(int nPage, HTREEITEM hRoot /* = TVI_ROOT */)
00519 {
00520         // Special handling for root case
00521         if (hRoot == TVI_ROOT)
00522                 hRoot = m_pwndPageTree->GetNextItem(NULL, TVGN_ROOT);
00523 
00524         // Check parameters
00525         if (nPage < 0 || nPage >= GetPageCount())
00526         {
00527                 ASSERT(FALSE);
00528                 return NULL;
00529         }
00530 
00531         if (hRoot == NULL)
00532         {
00533                 ASSERT(FALSE);
00534                 return NULL;
00535         }
00536 
00537         // we are performing a simple linear search here, because we are
00538         // expecting only little data
00539         HTREEITEM       hItem = hRoot;
00540         while (hItem)
00541         {
00542                 if ((signed)m_pwndPageTree->GetItemData(hItem) == nPage)
00543                         return hItem;
00544                 if (m_pwndPageTree->ItemHasChildren(hItem))
00545                 {
00546                         HTREEITEM       hResult = GetPageTreeItem(nPage, m_pwndPageTree->GetNextItem(hItem, TVGN_CHILD));
00547                         if (hResult)
00548                                 return hResult;
00549                 }
00550 
00551                 hItem = m_pwndPageTree->GetNextItem(hItem, TVGN_NEXT);
00552         }
00553 
00554         // we've found nothing, if we arrive here
00555         return hItem;
00556 }

00559 BOOL CTreePropSheet::SelectPageTreeItem(int nPage)
00560 {
00561         HTREEITEM       hItem = GetPageTreeItem(nPage);
00562         if (!hItem)
00563                 return FALSE;
00564 
00565         return m_pwndPageTree->SelectItem(hItem);
00566 }

00573                 return FALSE;
00574

00578 
00579 void CTreePropSheet::UpdateCaption()
00580 {
00581         HWND                    hPage = PropSheet_GetCurrentPageHwnd(GetSafeHwnd());
00582         BOOL                    bRealPage = IsWindow(hPage) && ::IsWindowVisible(hPage);
00583         HTREEITEM       hItem = m_pwndPageTree->GetSelectedItem();
00584         if (!hItem)
00585                 return;
00586         CString         strCaption = m_pwndPageTree->GetItemText(hItem);
00587 
00588         // if empty page, then update empty page message
00589         if (!bRealPage)
00590                 m_pFrame->SetMsgText(GenerateEmptyPageMessage(m_strEmptyPageMessage, strCaption));
00591 
00592         // if no captions are displayed, cancel here
00593         if (!m_pFrame->GetShowCaption())
00594                 return;
00595 
00596         // get tab control, to the the images from
00597         CTabCtrl        *pTabCtrl = GetTabControl();
00598         if (!IsWindow(pTabCtrl->GetSafeHwnd()))
00599         {
00600                 ASSERT(FALSE);
00601                 return;
00602         }
00603 
00604         if (m_bTreeImages)
00605         {
00606                 // get image from tree
00607                 int     nImage;
00608                 m_pwndPageTree->GetItemImage(hItem, nImage, nImage);
00609                 HICON   hIcon = m_Images.ExtractIcon(nImage);
00610                 m_pFrame->SetCaption(strCaption, hIcon);
00611                 if (hIcon)
00612                         DestroyIcon(hIcon);
00613         }
00614         else if (bRealPage)
00615         {
00616                 // get image from hidden (original) tab provided by the original
00617                 // implementation
00618                 CImageList      *pImages = pTabCtrl->GetImageList();
00619                 if (pImages)
00620                 {
00621                         TCITEM  ti;
00622                         ZeroMemory(&ti, sizeof(ti));
00623                         ti.mask = TCIF_IMAGE;
00624 
00625                         HICON   hIcon = NULL;
00626                         if (pTabCtrl->GetItem((int)m_pwndPageTree->GetItemData(hItem), &ti))
00627                                 hIcon = pImages->ExtractIcon(ti.iImage);
00628 
00629                         m_pFrame->SetCaption(strCaption, hIcon);
00630                         if (hIcon)
00631                                 DestroyIcon(hIcon);
00632                 }
00633                 else
00634                         m_pFrame->SetCaption(strCaption);
00635         }
00636         else
00637                 m_pFrame->SetCaption(strCaption);
00638 }
00639 
00640 
00641 void CTreePropSheet::ActivatePreviousPage()
00642 {
00643         if (!IsWindow(m_hWnd))
00644                 return;
00645 
00646         if (!IsWindow(m_pwndPageTree->GetSafeHwnd()))
00647         {
00648                 // normal tab property sheet. Simply use page index
00649                 int     nPageIndex = GetActiveIndex();
00650                 if (nPageIndex<0 || nPageIndex>=GetPageCount())
00651                         return;
00652 
00653                 int     nPrevIndex = (nPageIndex==0)? GetPageCount()-1 : nPageIndex-1;
00654                 SetActivePage(nPrevIndex);
00655         }
00656         else
00657         {
00658                 // property sheet with page tree.
00659                 // we need a more sophisticated handling here, than simply using
00660                 // the page index, because we won't skip empty pages.
00661                 // so we have to walk the page tree
00662                 HTREEITEM       hItem = m_pwndPageTree->GetSelectedItem();
00663                 ASSERT(hItem);
00664                 if (!hItem)
00665                         return;
00666 
00667                 HTREEITEM       hPrevItem = NULL;
00668                 if (hPrevItem=m_pwndPageTree->GetPrevSiblingItem(hItem))
00669                 {
00670                         while (m_pwndPageTree->ItemHasChildren(hPrevItem))
00671                         {
00672                                 hPrevItem = m_pwndPageTree->GetChildItem(hPrevItem);
00673                                 while (m_pwndPageTree->GetNextSiblingItem(hPrevItem))
00674                                         hPrevItem = m_pwndPageTree->GetNextSiblingItem(hPrevItem);
00675                         }
00676                 }
00677                 else 
00678                         hPrevItem=m_pwndPageTree->GetParentItem(hItem);
00679 
00680                 if (!hPrevItem)
00681                 {
00682                         // no prev item, so cycle to the last item
00683                         hPrevItem = m_pwndPageTree->GetRootItem();
00684 
00685                         while (TRUE)
00686                         {
00687                                 while (m_pwndPageTree->GetNextSiblingItem(hPrevItem))
00688                                         hPrevItem = m_pwndPageTree->GetNextSiblingItem(hPrevItem);
00689 
00690                                 if (m_pwndPageTree->ItemHasChildren(hPrevItem))
00691                                         hPrevItem = m_pwndPageTree->GetChildItem(hPrevItem);
00692                                 else
00693                                         break;
00694                         }
00695                 }
00696 
00697                 if (hPrevItem)
00698                         m_pwndPageTree->SelectItem(hPrevItem);
00699         }
00700 }
00701 
00702 
00703 void CTreePropSheet::ActivateNextPage()
00704 {
00705         if (!IsWindow(m_hWnd))
00706                 return;
00707 
00708         if (!IsWindow(m_pwndPageTree->GetSafeHwnd()))
00709         {
00710                 // normal tab property sheet. Simply use page index
00711                 int     nPageIndex = GetActiveIndex();
00712                 if (nPageIndex<0 || nPageIndex>=GetPageCount())
00713                         return;
00714 
00715                 int     nNextIndex = (nPageIndex==GetPageCount()-1)? 0 : nPageIndex+1;
00716                 SetActivePage(nNextIndex);
00717         }
00718         else
00719         {
00720                 // property sheet with page tree.
00721                 // we need a more sophisticated handling here, than simply using
00722                 // the page index, because we won't skip empty pages.
00723                 // so we have to walk the page tree
00724                 HTREEITEM       hItem = m_pwndPageTree->GetSelectedItem();
00725                 ASSERT(hItem);
00726                 if (!hItem)
00727                         return;
00728 
00729                 HTREEITEM       hNextItem = NULL;
00730                 if (hNextItem=m_pwndPageTree->GetChildItem(hItem))
00731                         ;
00732                 else if (hNextItem=m_pwndPageTree->GetNextSiblingItem(hItem))
00733                         ;
00734                 else if (m_pwndPageTree->GetParentItem(hItem))
00735                 {
00736                         while (!hNextItem)
00737                         {
00738                                 hItem = m_pwndPageTree->GetParentItem(hItem);
00739                                 if (!hItem)
00740                                         break;
00741 
00742                                 hNextItem       = m_pwndPageTree->GetNextSiblingItem(hItem);
00743                         }
00744                 }
00745 
00746                 if (!hNextItem)
00747                         // no next item -- so cycle to the first item
00748                         hNextItem = m_pwndPageTree->GetRootItem();
00749 
00750                 if (hNextItem)
00751                         m_pwndPageTree->SelectItem(hNextItem);
00752         }
00753 }
00754 
00755 
00757 // Overridings
00758 
00759 BOOL CTreePropSheet::OnInitDialog() 
00760 {
00761         if (m_bTreeViewMode)
00762         {
00763                 // be sure, there are no stacked tabs, because otherwise the
00764                 // page caption will be to large in tree view mode
00765                 EnableStackedTabs(FALSE);
00766 
00767                 // Initialize image list.
00768                 if (m_DefaultImages.GetSafeHandle())
00769                 {
00770                         IMAGEINFO       ii;
00771                         m_DefaultImages.GetImageInfo(0, &ii);
00772                         if (ii.hbmImage) DeleteObject(ii.hbmImage);
00773                         if (ii.hbmMask) DeleteObject(ii.hbmMask);
00774                         m_Images.Create(ii.rcImage.right-ii.rcImage.left, ii.rcImage.bottom-ii.rcImage.top, ILC_COLOR32|ILC_MASK, 0, 1);
00775                 }
00776                 else
00777                         m_Images.Create(16, 16, ILC_COLOR32|ILC_MASK, 0, 1);
00778         }
00779 
00780         // perform default implementation
00781         BOOL bResult = CPropertySheet::OnInitDialog();
00782 
00783         if (!m_bTreeViewMode)
00784                 // stop here, if we would like to use tabs
00785                 return bResult;
00786 
00787         // Get tab control...
00788         CTabCtrl        *pTab = GetTabControl();
00789         if (!IsWindow(pTab->GetSafeHwnd()))
00790         {
00791                 ASSERT(FALSE);
00792                 return bResult;
00793         }
00794 
00795         // ... and hide it
00796         pTab->ShowWindow(SW_HIDE);
00797         pTab->EnableWindow(FALSE);
00798 
00799         // Place another (empty) tab ctrl, to get a frame instead
00800         CRect   rectFrame;
00801         pTab->GetWindowRect(rectFrame);
00802         ScreenToClient(rectFrame);
00803 
00804         m_pFrame = CreatePageFrame();
00805         if (!m_pFrame)
00806         {
00807                 ASSERT(FALSE);
00808                 AfxThrowMemoryException();
00809         }
00810         m_pFrame->Create(WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE|WS_CLIPSIBLINGS, rectFrame, this, 0xFFFF);
00811         m_pFrame->ShowCaption(m_bPageCaption);
00812 
00813         // Lets make place for the tree ctrl
00814         const int       nTreeWidth = m_nPageTreeWidth;
00815         const int       nTreeSpace = 5;
00816 
00817         CRect   rectSheet;
00818         GetWindowRect(rectSheet);
00819         rectSheet.right+= nTreeWidth;
00820         SetWindowPos(NULL, -1, -1, rectSheet.Width(), rectSheet.Height(), SWP_NOZORDER|SWP_NOMOVE);
00821         CenterWindow();
00822 
00823         MoveChildWindows(nTreeWidth, 0);
00824 
00825         // Lets calculate the rectangle for the tree ctrl
00826         CRect   rectTree(rectFrame);
00827         rectTree.right = rectTree.left + nTreeWidth - nTreeSpace;
00828 
00829         // calculate caption height
00830         CTabCtrl        wndTabCtrl;
00831         wndTabCtrl.Create(WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE|WS_CLIPSIBLINGS, rectFrame, this, 0x1234);
00832         wndTabCtrl.InsertItem(0, _T(""));
00833         CRect   rectFrameCaption;
00834         wndTabCtrl.GetItemRect(0, rectFrameCaption);
00835         wndTabCtrl.DestroyWindow();
00836         m_pFrame->SetCaptionHeight(rectFrameCaption.Height());
00837 
00838         // if no caption should be displayed, make the window smaller in
00839         // height
00840         if (!m_bPageCaption)
00841         {
00842                 // make frame smaller
00843                 m_pFrame->GetWnd()->GetWindowRect(rectFrame);
00844                 ScreenToClient(rectFrame);
00845                 rectFrame.top+= rectFrameCaption.Height();
00846                 m_pFrame->GetWnd()->MoveWindow(rectFrame);
00847 
00848                 // move all child windows up
00849                 MoveChildWindows(0, -rectFrameCaption.Height());
00850 
00851                 // modify rectangle for the tree ctrl
00852                 rectTree.bottom-= rectFrameCaption.Height();
00853 
00854                 // make us smaller
00855                 CRect   rect;
00856                 GetWindowRect(rect);
00857                 rect.top+= rectFrameCaption.Height()/2;
00858                 rect.bottom-= rectFrameCaption.Height()-rectFrameCaption.Height()/2;
00859                 if (GetParent())
00860                         GetParent()->ScreenToClient(rect);
00861                 MoveWindow(rect);
00862         }
00863 
00864         // finally create tht tree control
00865         const DWORD     dwTreeStyle = TVS_SHOWSELALWAYS|TVS_TRACKSELECT|TVS_HASLINES|TVS_LINESATROOT|TVS_HASBUTTONS;
00866         m_pwndPageTree = CreatePageTreeObject();
00867         if (!m_pwndPageTree)
00868         {
00869                 ASSERT(FALSE);
00870                 AfxThrowMemoryException();
00871         }
00872         
00873         // MFC7-support here (Thanks to Rainer Wollgarten)
00874         #if _MFC_VER >= 0x0700
00875         {
00876                 m_pwndPageTree->CreateEx(
00877                         WS_EX_CLIENTEDGE|WS_EX_NOPARENTNOTIFY, 
00878                         WS_TABSTOP|WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE|dwTreeStyle, 
00879                         rectTree, this, s_unPageTreeId);
00880         }
00881         #else
00882         {
00883                 m_pwndPageTree->CreateEx(
00884                         WS_EX_CLIENTEDGE|WS_EX_NOPARENTNOTIFY, 
00885                         _T("SysTreeView32"), _T("PageTree"), 
00886                         WS_TABSTOP|WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE|dwTreeStyle, 
00887                         rectTree, this, s_unPageTreeId);
00888         }
00889         #endif
00890         
00891         if (m_bTreeImages)
00892         {
00893                 m_pwndPageTree->SetImageList(&m_Images, TVSIL_NORMAL);
00894                 m_pwndPageTree->SetImageList(&m_Images, TVSIL_STATE);
00895         }
00896 
00897         // Fill the tree ctrl
00898         RefillPageTree();
00899 
00900         // Select item for the current page
00901         if (pTab->GetCurSel() > -1)
00902                 SelectPageTreeItem(pTab->GetCurSel());
00903 
00904         // Resize the sheet at the bottom to make space for the buttons
00905         int width = 80, height = 25, offset = 6;
00906         rectSheet.bottom += 2*offset;
00907     MoveWindow(rectSheet);
00908 
00909         // Add OK, Cancel and Apply buttons at the bottom
00910         ScreenToClient(rectSheet);
00911         CRect r_ok(rectSheet.right - 3*width - 4*offset, rectSheet.bottom- height - offset, rectSheet.right - 2*width - 4*offset, rectSheet.bottom - offset);
00912         CRect r_cancel(rectSheet.right - 2*width - 3*offset, rectSheet.bottom- height - offset, rectSheet.right - 1*width - 3*offset, rectSheet.bottom - offset);
00913         CRect r_apply(rectSheet.right - 1*width - 2*offset, rectSheet.bottom- height - offset, rectSheet.right - 0*width - 2*offset, rectSheet.bottom - offset);
00914         // ------ Uncomment below to use as a realy property sheet ---------------
00915         m_ok.Create("Ok",       BS_PUSHBUTTON|WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE|WS_TABSTOP, r_ok, this, IDC_BUTTON_OK);
00916         m_cancel.Create("Cancel",       BS_PUSHBUTTON|WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE|WS_TABSTOP, r_cancel, this, IDC_BUTTON_CANCEL);
00917         m_ok.SetFont(GetFont());
00918         m_cancel.SetFont(GetFont());
00919         m_apply.Create("Apply", BS_PUSHBUTTON|WS_CHILD|WS_VISIBLE|WS_TABSTOP, r_apply, this, IDC_BUTTON_APPLY);
00920         GetActivePage()->SetDefID(IDC_BUTTON_APPLY);
00921 
00922         // Expand all tree items
00923         HTREEITEM hCurrent = m_pwndPageTree->GetNextItem(NULL, TVGN_FIRSTVISIBLE);
00924         while (hCurrent != NULL)
00925         {
00926                 m_pwndPageTree->Expand(hCurrent, TVE_EXPAND);
00927                 hCurrent = m_pwndPageTree->GetNextItem(hCurrent, TVGN_NEXT);
00928         }
00929         
00930         return bResult;
00931 }
00932 
00933 
00934 void CTreePropSheet::OnDestroy() 
00935 {
00936         CPropertySheet::OnDestroy();
00937         
00938         if (m_Images.GetSafeHandle())
00939                 m_Images.DeleteImageList();
00940 
00941         delete m_pwndPageTree;
00942         m_pwndPageTree = NULL;
00943 
00944         delete m_pFrame;
00945         m_pFrame = NULL;
00946 }

00949 LRESULT CTreePropSheet::OnAddPage(WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
00950 {
00951         LRESULT lResult = DefWindowProc(PSM_ADDPAGE, wParam, lParam);
00952         if (!m_bTreeViewMode)
00953                 return lResult;
00954 
00955         RefillPageTree();
00956         SelectCurrentPageTreeItem();
00957 
00958         return lResult;
00959 }

00963 {

00965         if (!m_bTreeViewMode)
00966                 return lResult;
00967 
00968         RefillPageTree();
00969         SelectCurrentPageTreeItem();
00970 
00971         return lResult;
00972 }

00997 
00998 
00999 void CTreePropSheet::OnPageTreeSelChanging(NMHDR *pNotifyStruct, LRESULT *plResult)
01000 {
01001         *plResult = 0;
01002         if (m_bPageTreeSelChangedActive)
01003                 return;
01004         else
01005                 m_bPageTreeSelChangedActive = TRUE;
01006 
01007         NMTREEVIEW      *pTvn = reinterpret_cast<NMTREEVIEW*>(pNotifyStruct);
01008         int                                     nPage = m_pwndPageTree->GetItemData(pTvn->itemNew.hItem);
01009         BOOL                            bResult;
01010         if (nPage<0 || (unsigned)nPage>=m_pwndPageTree->GetCount())
01011                 bResult = KillActiveCurrentPage();
01012         else
01013                 bResult = SetActivePage(nPage);
01014 
01015         if (!bResult)
01016                 // prevent selection to change
01017                 *plResult = TRUE;
01018 
01019         // Set focus to tree ctrl (I guess that's what the user expects)
01020         m_pwndPageTree->SetFocus();
01021 
01022         m_bPageTreeSelChangedActive = FALSE;
01023 
01024         return;
01025 }
01026 
01027 
01028 void CTreePropSheet::OnPageTreeSelChanged(NMHDR *pNotifyStruct, LRESULT *plResult)
01029 {
01030         *plResult = 0;
01031 
01032         UpdateCaption();
01033 
01034         return;
01035 }
01036 
01037 
01038 LRESULT CTreePropSheet::OnIsDialogMessage(WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam)
01039 {
01040         MSG     *pMsg = reinterpret_cast<MSG*>(lParam);
01041         if (pMsg->message==WM_KEYDOWN && pMsg->wParam==VK_TAB && GetKeyState(VK_CONTROL)&0x8000)
01042         {
01043                 if (GetKeyState(VK_SHIFT)&0x8000)
01044                         ActivatePreviousPage();
01045                 else
01046                         ActivateNextPage();
01047                 return TRUE;
01048         }
01049 
01050 
01051         return CPropertySheet::DefWindowProc(PSM_ISDIALOGMESSAGE, wParam, lParam);
01052 }
